solution_line_template: Each of the {num_children} children gets 1 juice box, {days_per_week} days a week, so she needs {num_children}*{days_per_week} = <<{num_children}*{days_per_week}={juice_boxes_per_week}>>{juice_boxes_per_week} juice boxes in 1 week

The school year is {weeks_in_school_year} weeks long and she needs {juice_boxes_per_week} juice boxes per week so she needs {weeks_in_school_year}*{juice_boxes_per_week} = <<{weeks_in_school_year}*{juice_boxes_per_week}={total_juice_boxes}>>{total_juice_boxes} juice boxes
